mapper.select: select top 1 userid, passwd1, custnm, pernm, useyn, perid from TB_XUSERS where userid=#{userid} and passwd1=#{passwd1} and useyn = '1'

select A.custcd AS custcd, A.spjangcd as spjangcd, B.cltcd as cltcd, substring(A.fdeldate, 5,2) + '/' + substring(A.fdeldate, 7,2) as fdeldatetext, A.fdeldate as fdeldate, A.fdelnum as fdelnum, A.fdelseq as fdelseq, isnull(A.pcode,'') as pcode, isnull(D.phm_pnam,'') as pname, isnull(A.grade,'') as grade, isnull(A.width,0) as width, isnull(A.thick,0) as thick, isnull(A.color,'') as color, isnull(A.deldate,'') as deldate, isnull(A.delnum,'') as delnum, isnull(A.delseq,'') as delseq, isnull(A.qty,0) as qty, isnull(A.uamt,0) as uamt, isnull(C.cltnm,'') as cltnm from TB_DA035 A WITH (NOLOCK) , TB_DA034 B WITH (NOLOCK) , TB_XCLIENT C WITH (NOLOCK) , TB_CA501 D WITH (NOLOCK) where A.spjangcd = B.spjangcd and A.fdeldate = B.fdeldate and A.fdelnum=B.fdelnum AND B.cltcd = C.cltcd and A.pcode = D.phm_pcod and A.fdeldate = #{todate} and ( Len(isnull(A.deldate , '')) = 0)

select A.custcd AS custcd, A.spjangcd as spjangcd, B.cltcd as cltcd, substring(A.deldate, 5,2) + '/' + substring(A.deldate, 7,2) as fdeldatetext, A.deldate as deldate, A.delnum as delnum, A.delseq as delseq, isnull(A.pcode,'') as pcode, isnull(D.phm_pnam,'') as pname, isnull(D.phm_size,'') as psize, isnull(A.qty,0) as qty, isnull(A.uamt,0) as uamt, isnull(A.samt,0) as samt, isnull(C.cltnm,'') as cltnm from TB_DA037 A WITH (NOLOCK) , TB_DA036 B WITH (NOLOCK) , TB_XCLIENT C WITH (NOLOCK) , TB_CA501 D WITH (NOLOCK) where A.spjangcd = B.spjangcd and A.deldate = B.deldate and A.delnum=B.delnum AND B.cltcd = C.cltcd and A.pcode = D.phm_pcod AND A.deldate = #{todate} AND A.deldate + A.delnum in (select deldate + delnum from tb_da035 where deldate = #{todate} ) ORDER BY A.deldate, A.delnum, A.delseq

select A.custcd AS custcd, A.spjangcd as spjangcd, B.cltcd as cltcd, substring(A.fdeldate, 5,2) + '/' + substring(A.fdeldate, 7,2) as fdeldatetext, A.fdeldate as fdeldate, A.fdelnum as fdelnum, A.fdelseq as fdelseq, isnull(A.pcode,'') as pcode, isnull(D.phm_pnam,'') as pname, isnull(A.grade,'') as grade, isnull(A.width,0) as width, isnull(A.thick,0) as thick, isnull(A.color,'') as color, isnull(E.deldate,'') as deldate, isnull(E.delnum,'') as delnum, isnull(E.seq,'') as delseq, isnull(A.delqty,0) as qty, isnull(C.cltnm,'') as cltnm, E.lotno as lotno from TB_DA035 A WITH (NOLOCK) , TB_DA034 B WITH (NOLOCK) , TB_XCLIENT C WITH (NOLOCK) , TB_CA501 D WITH (NOLOCK), TB_DA037H E WITH (NOLOCK) where A.spjangcd = B.spjangcd and A.fdeldate = B.fdeldate and A.fdelnum=B.fdelnum AND B.cltcd = C.cltcd and A.pcode = D.phm_pcod and A.deldate + A.delnum = E.deldate + E.delnum AND A.deldate = #{todate} and ( Len(isnull(A.deldate , '')) > 0) ORDER BY E.deldate, E.delnum, E.seq

select A.cltcd as cltcd, A.custcd AS custcd, A.spjangcd as spjangcd, substring(CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.fdeldate, 23), 6,2) + '/' + substring(CONVERT(CHAR(10), fdeldate, 23), 9,2) as fdeldatetext, CONVERT(CHAR(8), A.fdeldate, 112) as fdeldate, '' as fdelnum,'' as fdelseq, isnull(A.pcode,'') as pcode, A.pname as pname, isnull(A.grade,'') as grade, isnull(A.width,0) as width, isnull(A.thick,0) as thick, isnull(A.color,'') as color, isnull(A.deldate,'') as deldate, isnull(A.delnum,'') as delnum, isnull(A.delseq,'') as delseq, isnull(A.qty,0) as qty, isnull(A.cltnm,'') as cltnm, A.lotno as lotno FROM ( select A.delcltcd as cltcd, A.custcd AS custcd, A.spjangcd as spjangcd, A.pcode as pcode, B.phm_pnam as pname, B.phm_size as psize, isnull(A.grade,'') as grade, isnull(A.width,0) as width, isnull(A.thick,0) as thick, isnull(A.color,'') as color, isnull(A.deldate,'') as deldate, isnull(A.delnum,'') as delnum, isnull(A.delseq,'') as delseq, isnull(A.delqty,0) as qty, isnull(C.cltnm,'') as cltnm, A.itemcd as lotno, A.fdeldate from TB_DA006_IMPORT_PANNEL A WITH (NOLOCK) Left OUTER JOIN TB_CA501 B ON pcode=B.phm_pcod Left OUTER JOIN TB_XCLIENT C ON delcltcd=C.cltcd where CONVERT(CHAR(8), A.fdeldate, 112) = #{todate} and A.fdelchk = 'Y' union all select A. delcltcd as cltcd, A.custcd AS custcd, A.spjangcd as spjangcd, A.pcode as pcode, B.phm_pnam as pname, B.phm_size as psize, isnull(A.grade,'') as grade, isnull(A.width,0) as width, isnull(A.thick,0) as thick, isnull(A.color,'') as color, isnull(A.deldate,'') as deldate, isnull(A.delnum,'') as delnum, isnull(A.delseq,'') as delseq, isnull(A.delqty,0) as qty, isnull(C.cltnm,'') as cltnm, A.itemcd as lotno, A.fdeldate from TB_DA006_IMPORT_WINGBADY A WITH (NOLOCK) Left OUTER JOIN TB_CA501 B ON pcode=B.phm_pcod Left OUTER JOIN TB_XCLIENT C ON delcltcd=C.cltcd where CONVERT(CHAR(8), A.fdeldate, 112) = #{todate} and A.fdelchk = 'Y' ) A
select max(delnum) from TB_DA036 where deldate = #{fdeldate}

delete from tb_da037H where deldate = #{deldate} and delnum=#{delnum} and lotno =#{lotno}

update TB_DA006_IMPORT_WINGBADY set fdeldate = null, fdelchk = 'N' where CONVERT(CHAR(8), fdeldate, 112) = #{deldate} and fdelchk = 'Y' and itemcd = #{lotno}
